name: sarek_tumor_only
description: nf-core/sarek pipeline optimized for tumor-only somatic variant calling without matched normal. Detects SNVs/indels with Mutect2 (tumor-only mode), FreeBayes, mpileup; SVs with Manta, TIDDIT; CNVs with CNVkit, Control-FREEC. Note: Strelka2 is not used in tumor-only mode.
content:
Tumor-Only Somatic Analysis

This specialized configuration of nf-core/sarek is optimized for somatic variant calling on tumor samples without matched normal controls.

Analysis Pipeline:

  • SNVs/indels: Mutect2 (tumor-only mode), FreeBayes, mpileup

  • Structural variants (SVs): Manta, TIDDIT

  • Copy number variants (CNVs): CNVkit, Control-FREEC

  • Note: Strelka2 is not used in tumor-only mode as it requires matched normal samples

Key Features:

  • Specialized for tumor-only somatic variant discovery

  • Mutect2 configured for tumor-only mode with panel of normals

  • Comprehensive structural and copy number variant analysis

  • Suitable when matched normal samples are unavailable

Important: Results may have higher false positive rates compared to matched tumor-normal analysis due to lack of germline filtering.
